Package control

Class SimpleActionList

java.lang.Object
control.SimpleActionList
public class SimpleActionList extends Object
This class facilitates the creation of action lists for the game. It provides methods to use hero cards, movement cards, and handle actions in the game.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    SimpleActionList(Model model)
    Constructs a SimpleActionList with the specified model.
    SimpleActionList(Model model, PlayerData playerData)
    Constructs a SimpleActionList with the specified model and player data.

  • Constructor Details

    • SimpleActionList

      public SimpleActionList(Model model, PlayerData playerData)
      Constructs a SimpleActionList with the specified model and player data.
      Parameters:
      model - the game model.
      playerData - the player data used to generate the moves.

    • SimpleActionList

      public SimpleActionList(Model model)
      Constructs a SimpleActionList with the specified model. The player data is retrieved from the current player in the model.
      Parameters:
      model - the game model.

  • Method Details

    • useHeroCard

      public ActionList useHeroCard(HeroCard heroCard, MovementCard movementCard, Pawn pawn, Coord2D newKingPos)
      Creates an action list to use a hero card. This includes flipping a pawn, moving the king, and removing the hero card from the stage.
      Parameters:
      heroCard - the hero card to be used.
      movementCard - the movement card associated with the action.
      pawn - the pawn to be flipped.
      newKingPos - the new position of the king.
      Returns:
      the action list containing all the actions.

    • useMovementCard

      public ActionList useMovementCard(MovementCard movementCard, Coord2D newKingPos)
      Creates an action list to use a movement card. This includes moving one of the current player's or the opponent's pawns (if the pawn comes from the opponent, a pawn flip action will be added to te the list) moving the king, and removing the movement card.
      Parameters:
      movementCard - the movement card to be used.
      newKingPos - the new position of the king.
      Returns:
      the action list containing all the actions.

    • pickUpMovementCard

      public ActionList pickUpMovementCard(ContainerElement container)
      Creates an action list to pick up a movement card. The card is placed in the first empty position of the specified container.
      Parameters:
      container - the container to place the picked-up card.
      Returns:
      the action list containing all the actions.

    • pickUpMovementCard

      public ActionList pickUpMovementCard(ContainerElement container, Coord2D position)
      Creates an action list to pick up a movement card and place it in the specified position.
      Parameters:
      container - the container to place the picked-up card.
      position - the position in the container where the card will be placed.
      Returns:
      the action list containing all the actions.

    • getPossibleMovementCards

      public List<ActionPoints> getPossibleMovementCards()
      Gets the possible movement card actions for the player.
      Returns:
      a list of ActionPoints representing the possible actions for the player to play a movement card.

    • getPossibleHeroMove

      public List<ActionPoints> getPossibleHeroMove()
      Gets the possible hero move actions for the player.
      Returns:
      a list of ActionPoints representing the possible actions for the player to play a hero card.

    • getPossibleTakeCardAction

      public List<ActionList> getPossibleTakeCardAction()
      Gets the possible actions for the player to pick up a movement card.
      Returns:
      a list of ActionList representing the possible actions for the player to pick up a movement card.

    • getPossiblePlayerActions

      public List<ActionList> getPossiblePlayerActions()
      Generates all possible action lists for the current player.
      Returns:
      a list of all possible action lists.

    • redoMovementCardStack

      public ActionList redoMovementCardStack()
      Redoes the movement card stack by reshuffling the played movement cards and putting them back into the stack.
